data.actual_result: the spacing between the lines is not enough for the bottom part to appear
data.expected_result: the bottom part of first line (for example, the end of the letter y) should appear and there is enough spacing between the lines
data.short_description: Bottom part of first line gets cut by second line if second line contains single line code block
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a message that has normal text at the first line and a single-line code block at second line
